assign o_ack   = (in_wreq ? (wbuf_used_r == 2'd0) : i_rdata_valid) || (ack_owed_r && pop);
assign o_valid = (wbuf_used_r != 2'd0 || i_req) && !wait_rdata_valid_r;

always @(posedge reset, posedge clk) begin
	if (reset) begin
		wbuf_rp_r <= 'd0;
	end else begin
		if (pop) begin
			wbuf_rp_r <= !wbuf_rp_r;
		end
	end
end
